fields_of_interest: Competition, Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, External Relations, Public Health, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: CLP, Detergents regulation, Biocides, REACH, Air-freshners, Transport of Dangerous Goods, better regulation, sustainability, Seveso Directive, Chemical weapons, Explosive percursors, ingredients issues, environmental issues etc.
organisation_name: Association of the Greek Industry of Detergents and Soaps (SEVAS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
We are a Member of A.I.S.E. 
(https://www.aise.eu/default.aspx)
goals__remit:
Our members are producers and importers of detergents and household maintenance products (biocides included). 
We provide regular info to our members on all topics above and we advocate the sector's positions/interests to respective greek authorities.
